item.description:
Dinner and some knitting? Let's be Thankful at the Friendly Toast in Portsmouth!!

Knitting Origins:

Most histories of knitting place its origin somewhere in the Middle East, from where it spread to Europe by Mediterranean trade routes, and then to the Americas with European colonization. The earliest known examples were found in Egypt and cover a range of items, including complex colorful wool fragments and indigo blue and white cotton stockings, which have been dated between the 11th and 14th centuries CE.

This fiber fact and many more to come.

Also we have a knit night coming up.
item.name: Knit One Purl Two - Tuesday Nov 24th
